findings.title: Front-Running Attack
findings.description: The minimum return amount is not specified, or 0 is specified as a minimum value during operations with the router, allowing a “Sandwich” attack that may lead to the loss of tokens by swapping them using low rates.

findings.title: Flashloan Attack
findings.description: The project has a staking contract, which calculates rewards based on the token share in the liquidity pool. It is possible to manipulate the calculated rewards by depositing flashloaned tokens to the pool.
